DataElement.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men 2 Past 6 Months How Often Hard Enough for Penetration with Sexual Stimulation Erection Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often their erections were hard enough for penetration when the erection was due to sexual stimulation, using a 6 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Past 6 Months How Often Erection with Sexual Stimulation Hard Enough for Penetration Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._A question about how often an individual's erection was hard enough for penetration when the erection was due to sexual stimulation._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Concepts.definition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Property.preferredName: Past 6 Months How Often Erection with Sexual Stimulation Hard Enough for Penetration Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.:A question about how often an individual's erection was hard enough for penetration when the erection was due to sexual stimulation.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Often Erection with Sexual Stimulation Hard Enough for Penetration
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual's erection was hard enough for penetration when the erection was due to sexual stimulation.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.
